name: Hexawing Havoc
description:
(Controls: Use Arrow Keys to Move. Full Screen Recommended. Click onscreen once to start moving!)

Wave after wave of meteor is hunting your ship. You only have six weapons, which automatically shift in order every ten seconds. To find victory is to find rhythm in this hexagonal cycle - Will you be able to survive?

Created in Construct 3's Free Trial for 2019 for UCSC's Foundations of Game Design Course.
